tetris

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • tetris.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.util.Observable
    A list of rows comprising the gameplay area.
    Version:
    October 2012
    Author:
    Daniel M. Zimmerman (dmz@acm.org)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static char BOTTOM_BORDER_CHAR
      The character used in the String representation to represent the bottom border.
      static char CURRENT_PIECE_BLOCK_CHAR
      The character used in the String representation to represent a block of the current piece.
      static char EMPTY_BLOCK_CHAR
      The character used in the String representation to represent an empty block.
      static char FROZEN_BLOCK_CHAR
      The character used in the String representation to represent a frozen block.
      static int ROWS_ABOVE_BOARD
      The number of rows that exist above the visible board area.
      static char SIDE_BORDER_CHAR
      The character used in the String representation to represent a side border.

      • isRowEmpty

        public boolean isRowEmpty(int the_y)
        Parameters:
        the_y - The row position.
        Returns:
        Is the row at position the_y, _not_ including the current piece, empty?

      • isRowFull

        public boolean isRowFull(int the_y)
        Parameters:
        the_y - The row position.
        Returns:
        Is the row at position the_y, including the current piece, full?

        public boolean isRowFullUnderProjection(int the_y)
        Parameters:
        the_y - The row position.
        Returns:
        Is the row at position the_y, including the projection of the current piece, full?

      • isWithinBoard

        public boolean isWithinBoard(Point the_point)
        Parameters:
        the_point - The point.
        Returns:
        true if the specified point is within the boundaries of the board, including the play area above the board, and false otherwise.
